title: St Teresa of the Andes Novena

days.title: Day 1 Prayer
days.text:
In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Intro Prayer

Merciful Lord, the joy of the saints, you set the youthful heart of Saint Teresa ablaze with the fire of virginal love for Christ and for His Church, and even in suffering you made her a cheerful witness to charity.
Through her intercession fill us with the delights of your Spirit, so that we may proclaim by word and deed the joyful message of your love to the world.
Especially we ask for her prayers for our intention (mention request here…)
Grant this through our Lord Jesus Christ, your Son, who lives and reigns with you and the Holy Spirit, one God, for ever and ever. 
Amen.

Concluding Prayer

Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be
St Teresa of the Andes, pray for us!
